content: these cute chickens are so cute and ready to join your collection you can make multiple chicks and chickens to make it custom for any family you desire in any color you wish they work up quickly and it s a no/low-sew pattern the only sewing required is for the eyes so it s perfect for those who don t like a lot of sewing it s also a great project for using up all that scrap yarn that builds up overtime start your new project today i m pretty new to creating patterns and would love any input/thoughts anyone wants to share --please note this is a digital download no physical product will be shipped -- the following digital download is a pdf crochet pattern to make a crochet chicken and chick it s a beginner difficulty pattern you need knowledge of magic_ring basic stitches increases decreases and crocheting on main piece instead of sewing pdf pattern includes 6 pages of detailed pattern pictures of final product description of items needed and associated terms materials needed -5 00 mm h/8 crochet hook -tapestry needle and scissors -polyester fiberfill stuffing -less than 1 skein of each color of worsted weight yarn colors i used were white black red orange and yellow this pattern is for personal use only please do not resell or redistribute without express permission you can sell the items made as long as it s not in a commercial quantities and pattern credited to @aybeecreates i d love to see the projects you create please tag me @aybeecreate you can contact me at aybeecreates@gmail com with any questions or concerns thank you so much for your support you can also find me on etsy under the same name happy crocheting <3
